categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Troy" was a clone trooper sergeant serving in the 18th Battalion during the Clone Wars. An outspoken trooper, Troy questioned the sense of following Bant Eerin's new padawan whom he referred to as a "youngling". Although Troy quickly silenced himself after being chastised by his CO, he later continued to spout derogatory comments toward the padawan and the padawan's plan. But by the end of the Battle of Akoshissss, Troy had come to respect his commander, shaking hands and claiming it had been an honor.
